dashboard_table1: SELECT (count(?kg) as ?kgc) (sum(?kgic) as ?kgics) (sum(?kdgc2) as ?kdgcs) (sum(?mac) as ?macs) (sum(?mpc) as ?mpcs) (sum(?mkc) as ?mkcs)

SELECT ?kg (count(distinct ?kdg) as ?kdgc) (if(count(distinct ?ds)>0,1,0) as ?dsc) (if(count(distinct ?org)>0,1,0) as ?orgc) (if(count(distinct ?kh)>0,1,0) as ?khc) (count(distinct ?ma) as ?mac) (count(distinct(?mp)) as ?mpc) (count(distinct(?mk)) as ?mkc)
dashboard_table2: select (?dom as ?domein) ?domein_label ('dashboard_dom_info' as ?domein_link) (concat(str(?kgics),'/',str(3*?kgc),' (',str(xsd:integer(100*?kgics/(3*?kgc))),'%)') as ?ingericht) (concat(str(?macs),'/',str(?kdgcs),' (',str(xsd:integer(100*?macs/?kdgcs)),'%)') as ?aangeboden) (concat(str(?mpcs),'/',str(?kdgcs),' (',str(xsd:integer(100*?mpcs/?kdgcs)),'%)') as ?beschikbaar) (concat(str(?mkcs),'/',str(?kdgcs),' (',str(xsd:integer(100*?mkcs/?kdgcs)),'%)') as ?herbruikbaar)
select ?dom ?domein_label (count(?kg) as ?kgc) (sum(?kgic) as ?kgics) (sum(?kdgc2) as ?kdgcs) (sum(?mac) as ?macs) (sum(?mpc) as ?mpcs) (sum(?mkc) as ?mkcs)

SELECT ?kg (count(distinct ?kdg) as ?kdgc) (if(count(distinct ?ds)>0,1,0) as ?dsc) (if(count(distinct ?org)>0,1,0) as ?orgc) (if(count(distinct ?kh)>0,1,0) as ?khc) (count(distinct ?ma) as ?mac) (count(distinct(?mp)) as ?mpc) (count(distinct(?mk)) as ?mkc)
dashboard_dom_info_table1: SELECT (?kg as ?kennisgebied) ?kennisgebied_label ('dashboard_kg_info' as ?kennisgebied_link) (concat(str(?dsc+?orgc+?khc),'/3') as ?ingericht) (concat(str(?mac),'/',str(if(?kdgc>0,2*?kdgc,2))) as ?aangeboden) (concat(str(?mpc),'/',str(if(?kdgc>0,2*?kdgc,2))) as ?beschikbaar) (concat(str(?mkc),'/',str(if(?kdgc>0,2*?kdgc,2))) as ?herbruikbaar)

SELECT ?kg ?kennisgebied_label (count(distinct ?kdg) as ?kdgc) (if(count(distinct ?ds)>0,1,0) as ?dsc) (if(count(distinct ?org)>0,1,0) as ?orgc) (if(count(distinct ?kh)>0,1,0) as ?khc) (count(distinct ?ma) as ?mac) (count(distinct(?mp)) as ?mpc) (count(distinct(?mk)) as ?mkc)
dashboard2_table1: SELECT (?kg as ?kennisgebied) ?kennisgebied_label ('dashboard_kg_info' as ?kennisgebied_link) (concat(str(?dsc+?orgc+?khc),'/3') as ?ingericht) (concat(str(?mac),'/',str(if(?kdgc>0,2*?kdgc,2))) as ?aangeboden) (concat(str(?mpc),'/',str(if(?kdgc>0,2*?kdgc,2))) as ?beschikbaar) (concat(str(?mkc),'/',str(if(?kdgc>0,2*?kdgc,2))) as ?herbruikbaar)

SELECT ?kg ?kennisgebied_label (count(distinct ?kdg) as ?kdgc) (if(count(distinct ?ds)>0,1,0) as ?dsc) (if(count(distinct ?org)>0,1,0) as ?orgc) (if(count(distinct ?kh)>0,1,0) as ?khc) (count(distinct ?ma) as ?mac) (count(distinct(?mp)) as ?mpc) (count(distinct(?mk)) as ?mkc)
magazijn_table1: SELECT ?status ?_graph ?type (if(bound(?m),?_graph,?m) as ?model) ?model_label (?type as ?model_link) (?_graph as ?triples) (concat(str(?aantal), ' triples') as ?triples_label) ?versie ?versiedatum ?registratie (str(?_graph) as ?graph)
toetsingslogboek__table1: SELECT ?_graph ?verzoek (?verzoek as ?verzoek_glink) ?verzoek_label ?status ?type (?_graph as ?model) ?model_label (?type as ?model_link) (?_graph as ?toetsing) ('Toetsing' as ?toetsing_label) ?modelstatus ?versie ?datum
modelverzoeken_table1: SELECT ?_graph ?verzoek (?verzoek as ?verzoek_glink) ?verzoek_label ?status ?type (?_graph as ?model) ?model_label (?type as ?model_link) (?_graph as ?toetsing) ('Toetsing' as ?toetsing_label) ?modelstatus ?versie ?datum
